channel.title: Stretchy div help

item.title: Stretchy div help
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

http://www.sneamia.net/quiknotes/
Not approved, so if you don’t trust me, don’t click.

It looks like this:

I need the div next to the “AP Calculus Finals Guide Available” to expand in height as the “AP Calculus Finals…” div expands. Any ideas how to do this? And while I’m posting, any hints to improve my shitty code?

HTML:

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml11/DTD/xhtml11.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1" />
<link href="style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
<!--[if IE]>
<style>
#everything{
  top:-15px;
}
</style>
<![endif]-->
<title>QKKnotes</title>
</head>

<body>
<div id="everything">
  <div id="header"></div>
  <div id="shadow1"></div>
  <div id="shadow2"></div>
  <div id="banner"><img src="images/banner.jpg" alt="Welcome to QuikNotes." /></div>
  <div id="navigation"><a href="index.php">HOME</a> | <a href="guides.php">PRODUCTS</a> | <a href="contact.php">CONTACT</a> | <a href="faq.php">FAQ</a></div>
  <div id="content">
    <div id="yeawehaveit"><img src="images/yeawehaveit.gif" alt="Yea, we probably have it." /></div>
	<div id="allsubjects">
	  <div id="topleftsubject"><img src="images/ush1h.jpg" alt="u.s. history 1 h" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/sp3h.jpg" alt="spanish III h" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/pch.jpg" alt="precalc h" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/bioh.jpg" alt="biology h" /></div>
	  <div id="toprightsubject"><img src="images/physh.jpg" alt="physics h" /></div>
	  <div id="bottomleftsubject"><img src="images/ush2h.jpg" alt="u.s. history II h" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/f3h.jpg" alt="french III h" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/apcab.jpg" alt="ap calculus" /></div>
	  <div class="subject"><img src="images/chemh.jpg" alt="chemistry h" /></div>
	  <div id="bottomrightsubject"><img src="images/apchem.jpg" alt="ap chemistry" /></div>
	</div>
	<div id="subjectsbottom"><img src="images/subjectsbottom.gif" alt="" /></div>
	<div id="searchbox">
	  <div id="searchleft"><img src="images/searchleft.jpg" alt="Search for the right guide:" /></div>
	  <div id="search">
	    <form action="index.php">
		<fieldset id="searchfield">
		  <input type="text" value="Bob...lol" class="searchinput" /> <input type="submit" value="" class="searchsubmit" />
		</fieldset>
		</form>
	  </div>
	  <div id="searchright"><img src="images/searchright.jpg" alt="" /></div>
	</div>
	<div id="news">
	  <div id="newstitle"><img src="images/newstitle.gif" alt="news" /></div>
	  <div id="newsfeed">
	    <h1>AP Calculus Finals Guide Available</h1>
		<hr />
		<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Cras pulvinar, ligula convallis dictum dignissim, magna urna blandit elit, semper mattis est elit vel urna. Duis enim magna, dictum ut, interdum et, consectetuer in, erat. Curabitur pulvinar eleifend dui. Nullam rhoncus commodo libero. Nulla justo. Sed lectus orci, laoreet eu, semper quis, lacinia ut, neque. Phasellus risus. Aliquam accumsan leo viverra nunc. Ut lacinia ligula vitae tellus. In tellus nisl, vehicula non, vehicula in, interdum feugiat, justo. Nam faucibus aliquam arcu. Praesent molestie posuere risus. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Suspendisse molestie neque ac libero. Quisque tincidunt nibh id mi. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Sed vulputate vestibulum risus.</p>
	  </div>
	  <div id="newsrss"></div>
	</div>
	
  </div>
</div>
</body>
</html>

CSS:

/* CSS Document */

body{
	background-image:url(images/bg.gif);
	background-repeat:repeat;
	text-align:center;
	font-family:Tahoma, Verdana, Serif;
	font-size:8px;
	
}

a:link{
	background-color:transparent;
	color:#ffffff;
	text-decoration:none;
	border-width:0px;
	
}

a:visited{
	background-color:transparent;
	color:#ffffff;
	text-decoration:none;
	
}

a:hover{
	background-color:transparent;
	color:#cccccc;
	text-decoration:none;
	
}

a:active{
	background-color:transparent;
	color:#999999;
	text-decoration:underline;
	
}

hr{
	width:410px;
	margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;

}

h1{
	font-family:Verdana, Serif;
	font-size:14px;
	color:#666666;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	text-align:left;

}

p{
	font-family:Tahoma, Serif;
	font-size:8px;
	color:#666666;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	text-align:left;
	text-indent:20px;
	
}

#everything{
	position:relative;
	width:840px;
	margin-left:auto;
	margin-right:auto;
	height:100%;
	text-align:center;
	visibility: visible;
	top:-8px;
	
}

#shadow1{
	background-image:url(images/shadow1.png);
	background-repeat:repeat-y;
	float:left;
	clear:none;
	width:20px;
	color:#ff0000;
	position:relative;
	top:-20px;
	min-height:600px;

}

#shadow2{
	background-image:url(images/shadow2.png);
	background-repeat:repeat-y;
	float:right;
	clear:none;
	width:20px;
	color:#ff0000;
	position:relative;
	top:-20px;
	min-height:600px;

}

#header{
	height:20px;
	width:800px;
	background-color:#e8e8e8;
	color:#ffffff;
	margin:0px auto 0px auto;
	color:#FF0000;
	position:relative;

}

#headspace{
	height:2px;
	width:800px;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	color:#ff0000;
	margin:0px auto 0px auto;
	
}

#banner{
	height:80px;
	width:800px;
	padding:2px 0px 1px 0px;
	margin:0px auto 0px auto;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	
}

#navigation{
	height:17px;
	width:795px;
	background-color:#bfbfbf;
	color:#ffffff;
	margin:0px auto 0px auto;
	padding:3px 0px 0px 5px;
	text-align:left;
	font-weight:bold;
	font-family:Tahoma, Verdana, Serif;
	font-size:10px;
	
}

#content{
	width:770px;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	color:#333333;
	padding:15px;
	margin:0px auto 0px auto;
	height:447px;
	min-height:447px;
	
}

#yeawehaveit{
	width:550px;
	height:41px;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	color:#cccccc;
	margin:0px 15px 1px 0px;
	float:left;

}

#allsubjects{
	width:550px;
	height:101px;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	color:#ffffff;
	float:left;
	
	
}

#topleftsubject{
	width:110px;
	height:50px;
	clear:left;
	float:left;
	margin:0px 1px 1px 0px;
	
}

.subject{
	width:110px;
	height:50px;
	float:left;
	margin:0px 1px 1px 0px;

}

#toprightsubject{
	width:106px;
	height:50px;
	clear:right;
	float:left;
	margin:0px 0px 1px 0px;

}

#bottomleftsubject{
	width:110px;
	height:50px;
	clear:left;
	float:left;
	margin:0px 1px 1px 0px;

}

#bottomrightsubject{
	width:106px;
	height:50px;
	clear:right;
	float:left;
	margin:0px 0px 1px 0px;

}

#subjectsbottom{
	width:550px;
	height:30px;
	float:left;
	margin:1px 0px 0px 0px;
	
}

#searchbox{
	margin:15px 0px 0px 0px;
	width:550px;
	height:60px;
	float:left;

}

#searchleft{
	width:135px;
	height:60px;
	float:left;
	clear:left;
	margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;
	
}

#search{
	width:404px;
	height:60px;
	background-image:url(images/searchbg.gif);
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	float:left;
	
}

#searchfield{
	border:0px none #ffffff;
	
}

input.searchinput{
	margin:15px 0px auto 0px;
	height:20px;
	width:300px;
	border:1px solid #666666;
	
}

input.searchsubmit{
	margin:15px 0px auto 0px;
	background-image:url(images/searchbutton.gif);
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-color:#ffffff;
	height:18px;
	width:52px;
	border:0px none #000000;
	
}

#searchright{
	float:left;
	height:60px;
	width:11px;

}

#news{
	float:left;
	width:550px;
	margin:15px 0px 0px 0px;
	
}

#newstitle{
	width:550px;
	height:30px;
	float:left;
	
}

#newsfeed{
	padding:0px 15px 15px 15px;
	height:154px;
	min-height:154px;
	width:399px;
	float:left;
	clear:left;
	border-color:#000000 #000000 #b9b9b9 #b9b9b9;
	border-width:0px 0px 1px 1px;
	border-style:solid;
	
}

#newsrss{
	float:left;
	height:169px;
	min-height:169px;
	width:118px;
	border-color:#000000 #b9b9b9 #b9b9b9 #ffffff;
	border-width:0px 1px 1px 1px;
	border-style:solid;
	background-color:#efefef;
	
}
